name: Coñaripe
description:
2D retro inspired brawler with snes-like graphics, stop the spaniard invasion in the south of Chile, using the cutest Colocolo cat warrior. Defeat wave after wave of enemies, can you keep your score high? (you can only play as the colo colo cat in this version, we might add the other characters in the future)

Controls

-Arrow keys/gamepad Dpad/Analog to move

-Z Key/ X button on the gamepad to attack

You can press the F key for fullscreen

Created and developed by

-Programmer : Cristóbal Muñoz (Crismoonster)

-Graphics: Diego Cereceda

Music by

Cristobal Rojas https://soundcloud.com/discordiaeosts
